page.title: 01REVIEW OF THE AREA.
page.content: This is a highly urbanised area of north{Liverpool.}It's dominated by the {River Mersey}and the docks.{Industry is located in the zone around the docks.{Industry}has declined and much of the area is run down and derelict. However pockets of new{industry}are being developed on a small scale. Another feature is the high density of office space in{Bootle}as offices have decentralized away from{Liverpool. } {Housing}is high density dominated by older terrace properties with some smaller council estates providing flats and maisonettes. Older shopping areas have declined in importance. The principal shopping areas are{Walton {Rd.}and{Bootle New Strand. Transport is good. The area is served by the {Merseyrail Network}and a large number of bus services operate in the area.
